title: Branislav Ivanović
summary: Branislav Ivanović (Serbian Cyrillic: Бранислав Ивановић, pronounced [brǎnislaʋ iʋânoʋitɕ]; born 22 February 1984) is a Serbian professional footballer who most recently played for English club West Bromwich Albion. A versatile defender, Ivanović plays as a right back, although he can also play as a centre back.
